name: Foggy Shooter
description:
The objective of the game is to survive and accumulate as many points as possible, you will have to shoot at the wall to create holes. There are 3 types of walls: orange takes 1 shot to destroy, red takes 2, and black is indestructible.

Use the arrows or 'A' and 'D' to dodge,  space bar to jump and ctrl to shoot.
